org.elasticsearch.action.termvectors

Class TermVectorsRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextAndHeaderHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<T>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.support.single.shard.SingleShardRequest<TermVectorsRequest>
              • org.elasticsearch.action.termvectors.TermVectorsRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentRequest<TermVectorsRequest>, IndicesRequest, RealtimeRequest, HasContext, HasContextAndHeaders, HasHeaders, Streamable

    public class TermVectorsRequest
extends SingleShardRequest<TermVectorsRequest>
implements DocumentRequest<TermVectorsRequest>, RealtimeRequest
    Request returning the term vector (doc frequency, positions, offsets) for a document.

    Note, the SingleShardRequest.index(), type(String) and id(String) are required.

      • preference

        public java.lang.String preference()

      • preference

        public TermVectorsRequest preference(java.lang.String preference)
        Sets the preference to execute the search. Defaults to randomize across shards. Can be set to _local to prefer local shards, _primary to execute only on primary shards, or a custom value, which guarantees that the same order will be used across different requests.
